description:
Jay tosses and turns in bed as he traverses out of his schoolroom dream — but then, he wakes up in a hospital bed with super hot nurse Vanessa at his bedside. She begins to examine him and Jay hopes the “exam” will soon become a hand job. But no such luck; Vanessa is indeed focused on his dick, but she has another round of CBT in mind. As his cock is slapped and twisted Jay realizes his nightmare is continuing but has just morphed into a different scenario. Once she is no longer amused by abusing his now aching cock and balls, she magically materializes a flogger and a dragon’s tail, makes him bend over, and proceeds to make his ass just as red as his balls. And it’s not over yet! (Part 3 of 4)

This scene is a 2021 AVN Award nominee for Best Special Effects.
title: Fetish Dreamland (3 of 4)
